top_issues: Screen appears completely blank/white with no visible UI elements
Complete lack of hierarchy, typography, or content
Zero affordance or indication of functionality
top_fixes: Investigate why the view is failing to render content or if the screenshot capture failed
Implement the standard macOS window structure (title bar, toolbar, content area)
Add the core 'Install' functionality components (drop zone, list, buttons)
quick_wins: Verify the file path or rendering pipeline
Add a basic empty state message if no content is available
